long_description: The URBANEARS Zinken earphones deliver professional DJ-quality sound and comfort, at a price that goes easy on the wallet of an unpaid amateur. TurnCable features a rugged Kevlar(R) core for durability and a coiled section that gives you the freedom to move without disrupting the sound coming through the headphones. 6.3mm plug at one end of the cord enables DJ jam sessions, while a 3.5mm plug at the other end is perfect for your regular listening pleasure. Zoundplug jack on the earcap allows a friend to plug in and enjoy your music with you. Bask in sweet comfort with deluxe padding, swivel ear caps, adjustable headband and materials that don't absorb sweat or odors. Collapsible design makes these earphones easy to store and transport. The URBANEARS Zinken earphones come with a microphone and remote that are compatible with unprotected 3.5mm standard devices such as iPhone(R) and Android.
short_description: The URBANEARS Zinken earphones deliver professional DJ-quality sound and comfort, at a price that goes easy on the wallet of an unpaid amateur.
